T02D1887:184a-1: sam kshipt'a bhi she ka gu hya s'a m'a dzik /
T02D1887:184a-3: 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba mdor bsdus pa /
T02D1887:184a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1887:184a-5: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal la //
T02D1887:184a-6: chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang ni dril bu ming //
T02D1887:184a-7: rigs gsum dang ldan skal ldan slob dpon gsang ba
T02D1887:184a-8: mchog / dbang bskur dam pa dgu po gang zhig
T02D1887:184a-10: srid pa dag par skyed mdzad sgrol ma de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1887:184a-11: rtsod pa'i dus dang phrad bas yid gzungs rnam zhan cing //
T02D1887:184a-12: 'gro ba shin tu bsdus par 'dod cing nan tan med //
T02D1887:184a-13: des na dbang rim rgyas ba spangs pa'i dbang bskur mdor bsdus 'di //
T02D1887:184a-14: ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa yis ni brjod par bya //
T02D1887:184a-15: mu stegs la min rmongs la min //
T02D1887:184a-16: rtog ge skam po dag la min //
T02D1887:184a-17: nyan thos la min ma ning dang //
T02D1887:184a-18: rgan po byis pa la yang min //
T02D1887:184a-19: rgyal po la min bu la min //
T02D1887:184a-20: dad pa med pa la min pa'i //
T02D1887:184a-21: bdun dang brgyad pa la sbyin pa //
T02D1887:184a-22: bstan la phan pa 'dogs pa nyid //
T02D1887:184a-23: de la re zhig ji lta ba bzhin du dbang
T02D1887:184b-0: @184b bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa rig
T02D1887:184b-2: sngon la slob ma'i snod brtag ste /
T02D1887:184b-3: dad pa dang thos pa la sogs pa yongs su
T02D1887:184b-4: sbyangs pa don du gnyer zhing legs par brtags pa'i
T02D1887:184b-5: skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma dag la dbang
T02D1887:184b-6: bskur ba la sogs pas gzung bar 'dod pas ;
T02D1887:184b-7: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gnas ni rgyal po dang
T02D1887:184b-8: chom rkun la sogs pa nye bar 'tshe ba thams
T02D1887:184b-9: cad dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa la
T02D1887:184b-10: sogs par cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bris
T02D1887:184b-11: pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D1887:184b-12: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ras ris la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D1887:184b-13: mngon sum du byas pa'i dkyil 'khor du me tog dang /
T02D1887:184b-15: lha bshos la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang
T02D1887:184b-16: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas rang
T02D1887:184b-17: nyid slob ma 'jug pa'i rim pas zhugs la /
T02D1887:184b-18: yol ba'i phyi rol du yon dbul ba dbang bskur
T02D1887:184b-19: ba'i skal ba can cig gis slob ma rnam par
T02D1887:184b-20: snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs la /
T02D1887:184b-22: zhes pa 'dis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la gdong g-yogs bcings te /
T02D1887:184b-23: bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pa'i bum pa'i chus bsang gtor byas la /
T02D1887:184b-24: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i don du kye bde ba dga' ba khyod su yin zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D1887:184b-25: des kyang bde chen bdag ni skal ba bzang po zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1887:184b-27: aom sarbba yo ga tsittam autp'a da y'a mi /
T02D1887:184b-28: zhes pa 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1887:184b-29: de nas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje aom
T02D1887:184b-30: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra
T02D1887:184b-32: zhes pa 'dis snying gar rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1887:184b-33: de nas sngar smras pa'i yi ge lnga pos yol
T02D1887:184b-34: ba'i nang du bcug la 'di skad brjod par bya'o
T02D1887:184b-35: // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1887:184b-36: rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye
T02D1887:184b-38: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02D1887:184b-39: dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos /
T02D1887:184b-40: khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du
T02D1887:184b-41: smra bar ma byed cig / smras na khyod dam
T02D1887:185a-0: de nas rdo rje mgo bor bzhag nas 'di skad ces brjod @185a * //
T02D1887:185a-1: zhe sdang chen po'i nyams dang ldan pas na phat gnyis pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-2: mthu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don gyis na sv'a h'a /
T02D1887:185a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185a-4: cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i
T02D1887:185a-5: sngags gsungs pa / aom dzin dzik ces bya ba smos te dzi ni byang chub kyi sems te ;
T02D1887:185a-6: na ni gti mug mi gnas par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1887:185a-7: dzik ni 'dzin pa ste gti mug chen pos 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas su 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185a-9: cad kyi bdag pos phra ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185a-10: pa / aom ratna dhrik ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185a-11: ratna ni rin po che ste /
T02D1887:185a-12: sangs rgyas pa'i bar du che ba'i yon tan zad mi shes pa'i don to //
T02D1887:185a-13: dhrik ni brtul zhugs te phra ma chen po'i brtul
T02D1887:185a-14: zhugs kyis dri ma ma lus pa 'byed par byed
T02D1887:185a-15: pa'i don to // de nas bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1887:185a-16: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags
T02D1887:185a-18: aom aa ro lik ces bya ba smos te aa ni ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-19: ro ni nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D1887:185a-20: lik ni mngon par zhen pa ste 'dod chags chen pos sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i don to //
T02D1887:185a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185a-22: cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185a-23: pa / aom pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185a-25: chos thams cad gcig dang du ma dang bral bas rang bzhin med pa nyid du byas pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-26: dhrik ni rang la gnas pa ste yon tan dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu gzhan la phrag dog pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams
T02D1887:185a-28: cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185a-29: pa / aom mudga ra dhrik ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185a-30: mudga ra ni thob ste dad pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-31: dhrik ni brtul zhugs te phung po'i bdud zad par byed pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185a-33: cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185a-34: pa / aom danda dhrik ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185a-36: des 'joms par byed pa ste brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1887:185a-37: dhrik ni brtul zhugs te nyon mongs pa'i bdud zad par byed pa'o //
T02D1887:185b-0: de nas bcom @185b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1887:185b-1: thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje padma'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185b-2: pa / aom padma dhrik ces bya ba smos te padma ni chags pa'i don to //
T02D1887:185b-3: dran pa rnam par dag pa nyid yod pas so //
T02D1887:185b-4: dhrik ni brtul zhugs te 'chi bdag gi bdud zad par byed pa'o //
T02D1887:185b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185b-6: cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185b-7: pa / aom khadga dhrik ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185b-9: de ni zag pa med pa'i don shes rab kyi
T02D1887:185b-10: rang bzhin te ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs rnam par
T02D1887:185b-11: dag pa'o // dhrik ni brtul zhugs te lha'i bu
T02D1887:185b-12: rnam par g-yeng byed kyi bdud pham phar byed pa'o
T02D1887:185b-13: dag pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1887:185b-14: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje
T02D1887:185b-15: tsa rtsi ka'i sngags gsungs pa /
T02D1887:185b-16: aom mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185b-17: mo ha ra ni rnam par dag pa ste bde ba chen pos yongs su gang ba'i yid de /
T02D1887:185b-18: gti mug gshin rje gshed la gnyis su med pa rdzogs pas ti'o //
T02D1887:185b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185b-20: cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gsungs
T02D1887:185b-21: pa / aom dhve shva ra ti zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185b-22: dhve zhes bya ba ni lha ste bde ba'i rol pas mngon par rtse ba'o //
T02D1887:185b-23: zhe sdang chen po'i thugs la rab tu dbang ba'i phyir shva ra ste dbang phyug go //
T02D1887:185b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par rdzogs pas na ti'o //
T02D1887:185b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185b-26: cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags
T02D1887:185b-27: gsungs pa / aom r'a ga ra ti zhes bya
T02D1887:185b-28: ba smos pas r'a ga ni tshon te sna tshogs
T02D1887:185b-30: ra ni khrag ste mnyes par byed pa'o //
T02D1887:185b-31: 'dod chags rdo rje'i sku la yongs su rdzogs pas ti'o //
T02D1887:185b-32: de nas bcom ldag 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1887:185b-33: cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje go r'i ma'i sngags
T02D1887:185b-34: gsungs pa / aom badzra ra ti'i zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1887:185b-35: badzra ni rdo rje ste dbyer mi phyed pa'i don to //
T02D1887:185b-36: ra ni khrag ste snying rjes nye bar 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1887:185b-37: phrag dog rdo rje'i sku la rdzogs pa nyid kyis te'o //
T02D1887:185b-38: de yang thams cad gsangs ba las /
T02D1887:185b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1887:185b-40: nor bu lta bu'i sngags rnams ni //
T02D1887:185b-41: gsang chen rab tu sbyor ba yis //
T02D1887:185b-42: 'di ni bsam dpag dka' ba ste //
T02D1887:186a-1: dkyil na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1887:186a-2: rdo rje'i gzugs kyis cod pan la bzhugs par bsam
T02D1887:186a-3: par bya'o // de dag ni cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:186a-4: de nas rdo rje blangs la /
T02D1887:186a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D1887:186a-6: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1887:186a-7: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1887:186a-8: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje zung //
T02D1887:186a-9: zhes gdon zhing rdo rje snying ga la sogs par
T02D1887:186a-10: reg nas rdo rje lag pa g-yas su sbyin par
T02D1887:186a-11: bya'o // de dag ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:186a-12: de nas lag pa g-yon par dril bu byin la
T02D1887:186a-13: rdo rje dang dril bur ldan pa'i slob ma'i lag
T02D1887:186a-14: pa gnyis kyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du bcug la /
T02D1887:186a-15: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D1887:186a-17: dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ni bdag po'i dbang bskur ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1887:186a-18: de dag ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:186a-19: de'i rjes la rdo rje dang dril bu slob ma'i spyi bor bzung la /
T02D1887:186a-20: aom badzra satva tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra na ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02D1887:186a-21: kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes rigs dang mthun pa'i ming dag gdags so //
T02D1887:186a-22: dbang bskur ba de dag gis ni sngags dang rgyud
T02D1887:186a-23: nyan pa dang 'chad pa dang sngags sgrub pa la
T02D1887:186a-25: dbang bskur ba lnga po de nyid ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes brjod de /
T02D1887:186a-26: thams cad du spyan ma la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyi bya ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1887:186a-27: de dag ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:186a-28: de'i rjes la rig pa'i dbang bskur ba blangs shing slob dpon gyi sdom pa blangs pa la /
T02D1887:186a-29: rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba //
T02D1887:186a-30: gang gis khyod kyi drin gyis dag / bdag dang gzhan don nus 'gyur ba //
T02D1887:186a-31: brtse ba'i gter gyis bdag la stsol //
T02D1887:186a-32: zhes gsol ba btab par gyur pa'i slob ma la
T02D1887:186a-33: bsam gtan gyi spyan la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang
T02D1887:186a-34: bskur nas dam tshig gsum 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02D1887:186a-35: de la dam tshig gsum ni 'di yin te /
T02D1887:186a-36: h'um gi yi ge rdo rjer bsams nas /
T02D1887:186a-37: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1887:186a-38: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1887:186a-39: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1887:186a-40: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan
T02D1887:186b-0: 'das dam pa dang po'i skyes @186b bu'o zhes bya
T02D1887:186b-1: ba de kho na nyid rdo rje gzung ngo //
T02D1887:186b-2: de dag ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02D1887:186b-3: de ma thag tu yi ge aa las skyes pa'i dril bu la /
T02D1887:186b-4: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1887:186b-5: ye shes dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1887:186b-6: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02D1887:186b-7: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhing [?] //
T02D1887:186b-8: ces pa 'dis slob ma'i lag tu sbyin no //
T02D1887:186b-9: srid pa rang bzhin gyis ni dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D1887:186b-10: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D1887:186b-11: zhes bya ba 'dis slob mas kyang dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D1887:186b-12: de dag ni dril bu'i dam tshig ge //
T02D1887:186b-14: yid kyis lus ni brtan bya'i phyir //
T02D1887:186b-15: phyag rgya dam tshig ces byar gsungs //
T02D1887:186b-16: gang gis lus kun brtags pas na //
T02D1887:186b-17: des na phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1887:186b-18: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i lus
T02D1887:186b-19: kyis bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab
T02D1887:186b-20: par bya'o // de dag ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
T02D1887:186b-21: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni
T02D1887:186b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D1887:186b-23: / lha'i de kho nas ni lha'i rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1887:186b-24: slob dpon gyi las ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste /
T02D1887:186b-25: der slob dpon gyi 'jug pa'i bya ba'i mtshan nyid do zhes sems shing 'di gsum bstan par bya'o //
T02D1887:186b-26: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D1887:186b-27: su dmigs pa'i slob ma la rjes su gnang ba
T02D1887:186b-29: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D1887:186b-30: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D1887:186b-31: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa //
T02D1887:186b-32: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D1887:186b-33: zhes chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang rin po
T02D1887:186b-34: che dang padma dang las kyi sgra bcug la rim
T02D1887:186b-35: pa bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa lngas bya ste
T02D1887:186b-36: / de dag ni rjes su gnang ba'i sbyin pa'o //
T02D1887:186b-38: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1887:186b-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02D1887:186b-40: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02D1887:186b-41: phyag na rdo rjes brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1887:186b-42: zhes pas rdo rje sbyin te /
T02D1887:186b-43: sarbba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya
T02D1887:186b-44: tishtha ae sha stvam dh'a ra ya mi badzra satva
T02D1887:186b-46: zhes brjod du gzhug cing slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02D1887:186b-47: de dag ni rdo rje sbyin pa'o //
T02D1887:187a-1: rgyas kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsams nas /
T02D1887:187a-2: snying gar khu tshur g-yon pas chos gos kyi grva nas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la //
T02D1887:187a-4: aom 'dir ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
T02D1887:187a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1887:187a-6: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02D1887:187a-7: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D1887:187a-8: kye che ge mo zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i /
T02D1887:187a-9: siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhurbhu ba sva:/
T02D1887:187a-10: zhes bya bas lung bstan te /
T02D1887:187a-11: gang la 'phags pa'i phyag rgya 'dis lung ston par byed na /
T02D1887:187a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D1887:187a-13: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bla
T02D1887:187a-14: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1887:187a-15: tu lung ston par mdzad de /
T02D1887:187a-16: 'phags pa phyag rgya chen po 'di'i mthu dang gsang sngags kyi stobs kyis so zhes dad par bya'o //
T02D1887:187a-17: de dag ni lung bstan pa'o //
T02D1887:187a-18: de nas gsang ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1887:187a-19: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //
T02D1887:187a-20: de bas 'dod chags bral bya bar //
T02D1887:187a-21: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig / ma h'a sa ma ya h'a na h'um phat /
T02D1887:187a-23: mchog gsang dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02D1887:187a-24: mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis //
T02D1887:187a-25: sdig pa kun las nges grol bar //
T02D1887:187a-26: khyod ni de nyid legs par gnas //
T02D1887:187a-27: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D1887:187a-28: phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te //
T02D1887:187a-29: srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1887:187a-30: sding [*sdings?] pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las 'das //
T02D1887:187a-31: byang chub sems ni btang mi bya //
T02D1887:187a-32: rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D1887:187a-33: gang zhig skyes pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1887:187a-34: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'o //
T02D1887:187a-35: dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing //
T02D1887:187a-36: nam yang spang bar mi bya ste //
T02D1887:187a-37: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis //
T02D1887:187a-38: de ni bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1887:187a-39: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D1887:187a-40: nam yang spang bar mi bya'o //
T02D1887:187a-41: slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste //
T02D1887:187a-42: de ni sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs //
T02D1887:187a-43: rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas //
T02D1887:187a-44: dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya //
T02D1887:187a-45: ji ltar bde bar bde ba bzung //
T02D1887:187a-46: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1887:187a-47: de ring rdo rje slob dpon te //
T02D1887:187a-48: sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin pa khyod //
T02D1887:187a-49: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02D1887:187b-0: @187b lha rnams kyis ni bzhed pa yin //
T02D1887:187b-1: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D1887:187b-2: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02D1887:187b-3: 'bad pa yis ni bri bya zhing //
T02D1887:187b-4: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor //
T02D1887:187b-5: de dag ni dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02D1887:187b-6: rjes su gnang ba la sogs pa bzhi po 'di dag rnams ni //
T02D1887:187b-7: dbang bskur ba lnga'i de ma thag tu'am /
T02D1887:187b-8: bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag tu brjod par bya'o //
T02D1887:187b-9: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba nyid la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang skur ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1887:187b-10: dbang bskur ba lnga dang slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni bum pa'i dbang yin te /
T02D1887:187b-11: thams cad du bum pa'i byed pa yod pas so //
T02D1887:187b-12: dbang bskur ba drug po bya ba ni rgyud thams
T02D1887:187b-13: cad du yang 'gal ba med de 'jam dpal gyi
T02D1887:187b-14: rgyud la sogs pa rnams su bstan pa'i phyir ro
T02D1887:187b-15: // de dag ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:187b-16: de nas yol ba la sogs pa dben par byas
T02D1887:187b-17: pa'i phyogs su slob mas rang gi sems dang 'thad
T02D1887:187b-18: pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa
T02D1887:187b-19: dam tshig dang sdom pa dang ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D1887:187b-20: la mkhas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa shin
T02D1887:187b-21: tu dad pa snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyi shes
T02D1887:187b-22: rab gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma
T02D1887:187b-23: la phul la / byang chub rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas gsol pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D1887:187b-24: bla mas kyang ting nge 'dzin gsum mngon sum du
T02D1887:187b-25: byas shing de bzhin nyid kyi padma'i nang du sbyor
T02D1887:187b-26: bas bskyod pa'i rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud
T02D1887:187b-27: pa rang gis rig par byas nas /
T02D1887:187b-28: sems kyang nam mkha'i khams su ma lhung ba nyid
T02D1887:187b-29: du mtsho skyes nas rdo rje bton nas srin lag
T02D1887:187b-30: dang mthe bo dag gi sa slob ma'i mig dang
T02D1887:187b-31: lag pa'i spyod yul ma yin par de kha'i ni
T02D1887:187b-32: chu skyes kyi nam mkhar sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1887:187b-33: des kyang aa ho ma h'a su kha /
T02D1887:187b-34: zhes brjod de drangs nas longs spyod cing longs spyod kyi sbu gur gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1887:187b-35: de nyid kyis kyang langs la rang gi khyad par
T02D1887:187b-36: gyi nang nas khyad par du 'phags te me tog
T02D1887:187b-37: gi bcud kyi thigs pa gos dang bral zhing sgeg
T02D1887:187b-38: pa dang bcas pas de'i nam mkhar gzhug par bya'o
T02D1887:187b-39: // de ni shes rab dang thabs kyi gsang ba dag gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:187b-40: de nas de bzhin nyid gcig tu 'dong na de nyid kyis so //
T02D1887:187b-41: tha dad par 'dod na gzhan gyis te /
T02D1887:188a-1: pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1887:188a-2: su sngar smras pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba
T02D1887:188a-3: btab par gyur pa'i slob ma de'i lag pa bzhag
T02D1887:188a-4: la / nyams dga' gzungs 'di khyod kyis ni //
T02D1887:188a-5: bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags //
T02D1887:188a-6: 'khor ba'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1887:188a-7: bde ba dam pa myang bar gyis //
T02D1887:188a-8: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min //
T02D1887:188a-9: 'di ni 'gro ba gsum na dag / de bas 'di dang bral bar ni //
T02D1887:188a-10: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1887:188a-11: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02D1887:188a-13: de la dngos grub mchog ni med //
T02D1887:188a-14: ces brjod de gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1887:188a-15: de yang tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa byugs
T02D1887:188a-16: pa shin tu dri zhim pa la sogs pa'i me
T02D1887:188a-17: tog gi phreng bas steng du brgyan pa gos med
T02D1887:188a-18: par chu skyes mdzes pa gsal bar ston par byed
T02D1887:188a-19: cing slob ma la 'di skad smra bar bya ste
T02D1887:188a-20: / bu khyod bden par smra'am ci //
T02D1887:188a-21: bshad gci la sogs bza' ba dang //
T02D1887:188a-22: khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha //
T02D1887:188a-23: de bzhin mchog tu bud med gus //
T02D1887:188a-25: bu yis ji ltar bde bar smros //
T02D1887:188a-28: khrag dang khu ba sogs za dang ;
T02D1887:188a-29: / rtag tu bud med gus byas dang ;
T02D1887:188a-31: lha mo ci ste bdag mi spro //
T02D1887:188a-33: de dga' zhing byams pa dang ldan pas sgrub pa
T02D1887:188a-34: po la bdag po bzhin du rnam par lta zhing
T02D1887:188a-35: / tsog tsog por chu skyes bstan nas 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o //
T02D1887:188a-37: bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1887:188a-38: gang zhig chogs bsten byed pa //
T02D1887:188a-39: de yi mdun du nga gnas so //
T02D1887:188a-40: rdzogs sangs mnyes par bya ba la sogs //
T02D1887:188a-41: ji lta'i bya ba padmar gyis //
T02D1887:188a-42: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02D1887:188a-43: 'di nyid du ni rab tu gnas //
T02D1887:188a-44: aud phu la la bha ma dzi dzva la /
T02D1887:188a-45: la sogs pas byed pa legs par gdags pas /
T02D1887:188a-46: ji srid rnal 'byor byang chub sems //
T02D1887:188a-47: gdod pa ru ni mi byed pas //
T02D1887:188a-48: de srid rgyun mi chad pa yi //
T02D1887:188a-49: dga' skyes bde ba ci yang thob //
T02D1887:188a-50: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa'i //
T02D1887:188a-51: byang chub sems ni lhung gyur na //
T02D1887:188a-52: phung po rnam shes brgyal ba la //
T02D1887:188a-53: ma smad dngos grub ga la yod //
T02D1887:188b-0: mkha' @188b dbyings rdo rje mnyam sbyor dang //
T02D1887:188b-1: reg las rmad byung chen po yi //
T02D1887:188b-2: bde ba skyes pa gang yin pa //
T02D1887:188b-3: mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o //
T02D1887:188b-4: dga' bral dga' ba bdag dbus su //
T02D1887:188b-5: mtshan bya brtags la brtan par gyis //
T02D1887:188b-6: padma'i nam mkhar rdo rje dang //
T02D1887:188b-7: lte ba dag ni gnon nas su //
T02D1887:188b-8: rdo rje skyil mo krung la sems //
T02D1887:188b-9: nor bu'i nang du son pa lta //
T02D1887:188b-10: ye shes skye ba gang yin te //
T02D1887:188b-11: shin tu ye shes ngo bo yin //
T02D1887:188b-12: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1887:188b-13: da bu mar dmigs su med pa ste //
T02D1887:188b-14: gang tshe rnal 'byor ye shes mthong ;
T02D1887:188b-15: / bde bar 'gyur ba bde bar gnas //
T02D1887:188b-16: thun nam yang na nyi ma gcig / zla phyed zla ba khyud skor dang //
T02D1887:188b-17: bskal pa'am bskal pa stong phrag tu //
T02D1887:188b-18: ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas //
T02D1887:188b-19: de ltar brtags la ji ltar nus pas bzung ba
T02D1887:188b-20: la btang ste chu skyes lce nyid kyis rjes su
T02D1887:188b-21: blangs te / de kho na mthong bas byang chub
T02D1887:188b-22: kyi sems dam tshig gi ngo po gzung bar bya'o
T02D1887:188b-23: blangs te / // shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1887:188b-24: de'i rjes la dbang bskur ba bdun 'thob cing shes
T02D1887:188b-25: rab ye shes mngon sum du blangs pa nyid ma
T02D1887:188b-26: rnyed na yang tshig gis smras la dbang rin po
T02D1887:188b-27: che slob dpon gyi man ngag las ye shes kyi
T02D1887:188b-28: dbang sbyin pa de la bzhi pa mngon par brjod
T02D1887:188b-29: pa dbang bskur ba'i rin po che bla ma'i man
T02D1887:188b-30: ngag gis rtogs par bya ba'i ngo bo sbyin par
T02D1887:188b-32: slob pa ma'i mos pa yid kyis yongs brtags la //
T02D1887:188b-33: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas gsang byin nas //
T02D1887:188b-34: rgya che zab pa'i tshul la mos pa na //
T02D1887:188b-35: dbang bskur rin chen tshig nyid sbyin par bya //
T02D1887:188b-37: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur dngos su ma
T02D1887:188b-38: thob pa la slar yang tshig tsam gyis dbang bskur
T02D1887:188b-39: ba sbyin par mi bya ste /
T02D1887:188b-40: dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1887:188b-41: 'o na gal te shes rab ye shes kyi dbang
T02D1887:188b-42: bskur dngos su ma thob pa la tshig tsam gyi
T02D1887:188b-44: ji ltar na dge slong rnams rjes su gzung bar bya zhe na /
T02D1887:188b-45: dge slong rnams rjes su gzung bar mi bya ste /
T02D1887:188b-46: de dag la ni 'dir dbang med pa'i phyir /
T02D1887:188b-48: gang yang dge slong dngos dga' dang //
T02D1887:188b-49: gang yang rtog ge la dga'i mi //
T02D1887:188b-50: gang yang rgan po'i dngos gnas pa //
T02D1887:189a-1: la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02D1887:189a-4: so sor 'brang ma chen mo la sogs par gsungs pa /
T02D1887:189a-5: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya //
T02D1887:189a-6: bdud la bsdigs pa la brtson pa //
T02D1887:189a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsungs pa nyid do zhe na /
T02D1887:189a-8: 'on kyang dge slong 'ga' zhig gcig tu nges par
T02D1887:189a-9: grags pa'i dka' thub can nyan thos kyi theg pa
T02D1887:189a-11: de la ni sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba dbang med pa nyid do //
T02D1887:189a-12: yang gang zhig nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang theg
T02D1887:189a-13: pa chen por sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa ste
T02D1887:189a-14: / de la sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa la dbang yod de /
T02D1887:189a-15: de yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa med do //
T02D1887:189a-16: yang gang zhig nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang sngags
T02D1887:189a-17: kyi tshul la yang sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa
T02D1887:189a-18: ste / de la ni thams cad du dbang bskur
T02D1887:189a-19: ba la sogs pa'i dbang yod pa ste de nyid
T02D1887:189a-20: ni rdo rje 'dzin pas bdud la bsdigs pa la
T02D1887:189a-21: ste / sogs pa bya'o ; /'o na de ltar
T02D1887:189a-22: na yang ji ltar na dge slong gi sdom pa
T02D1887:189a-23: mi nyams par 'gyur ram zhe na /
T02D1887:189a-25: 'di ltar dge slong gi sdom pa ma btang bar /
T02D1887:189a-26: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D1887:189a-27: sdom pa so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1887:189a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gi tshe /
T02D1887:189a-29: sdom pa gzhan dang mi 'gal zhing ;
T02D1887:189a-30: / lhag pa yang so sor 'dzin pa yin na de'i tshe ji ltar sdom pa nyams /
T02D1887:189a-31: ci ste mi 'gal zhing lhag pa'i sdom pa ma
T02D1887:189a-32: nyams par yin du bcug na dge slong gi sdom
T02D1887:189a-33: pa la dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug par byed
T02D1887:189a-34: pa ji ltar mi nyams she na /
T02D1887:189a-35: de ltar na yang mi nyams te /
T02D1887:189a-36: 'dul ba la sogs par bkag pa spyod pa ni
T02D1887:189a-37: nyams par bstan gyi yang ma bkag par spyod pa
T02D1887:189a-39: khams gsum par gyur pa'i mi dang lha la sogs
T02D1887:189a-40: pa'i mdzes ma rnams la zag pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1887:189a-41: mngon par zhen pa myong pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod chags
T02D1887:189a-42: byang bar byed pa de dag 'dul ba la sogs
T02D1887:189a-43: par bkag gi / yang khams gsum pa las 'das
T02D1887:189a-44: pa'i lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du ngo
T02D1887:189a-45: bo gcig pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa
T02D1887:189a-46: rang snang ba'i ngo bo rnams ni ma yin no
T02D1887:189a-47: // gzhan du na rmi lam du nye bar dmigs pa dang /
T02D1887:189a-48: rtog pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo rnams la yang sdom pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1887:189b-0: ci ste de dag la @189b yang bdag gis legs par byas so //
T02D1887:189b-1: bdag gis rab tu gyur to zhes rab tu rjes
T02D1887:189b-2: su yi rang bar byed pa nyon mongs pa can
T02D1887:189b-3: gyi sems la ni ltung bar gyur pa nyid do
T02D1887:189b-4: zhe na / ltung ba tsam du gyur pa ni
T02D1887:189b-5: bden na yang sdom pa nyams pa ni ma yin
T02D1887:189b-6: zhe na / no // gal te de la smod
T02D1887:189b-7: pa'i sems su byed na de'i tshe ni ltung ba
T02D1887:189b-10: sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas na yang //
T02D1887:189b-11: bdag nyid smod par byed pa yang bar 'gyur //
T02D1887:189b-13: de ltar na ji ltar rmi lam na nye bar
T02D1887:189b-14: ma dmigs pa kun brags pa'i bud med rnams mos
T02D1887:189b-15: ba nyid 'jug pa'i tshor ba sred pa la yang
T02D1887:189b-16: sdom pa nyams pa med la smod pa ni ltung
T02D1887:189b-17: ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du
T02D1887:189b-18: khams gsum pa las 'das pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje
T02D1887:189b-19: la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo shes rab sems
T02D1887:189b-20: tsam gyi rang gi ngo bo rnams la yongs su
T02D1887:189b-21: dag pa mngon par ma zhen pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod
T02D1887:189b-22: chags chen po mngon du byed pa de mi dmigs
T02D1887:189b-23: pa stong ba nyid bsgoms pas smod pa nyid la
T02D1887:189b-24: dge slong gi dngos po nyams pa med cing ltung
T02D1887:189b-25: ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dod par
T02D1887:189b-26: bya'o // 'o na sems tsam du ngo bo gcig
T02D1887:189b-27: pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang gi
T02D1887:189b-28: ngo bo shes rab la rigs pa 'di yod na
T02D1887:189b-29: phyi rol gyi las kyi phyag rgya 'dul bar bkag
T02D1887:189b-30: pa la rigs pa 'di ji ltar yin zhe na
T02D1887:189b-32: ci 'dir khyed kyis gzugs la sogs pa rang gi
T02D1887:189b-33: sems snang ba tsam du lus gcig pa nyid kyi
T02D1887:189b-34: grags pa tsam yang ma thos sam gang gis ni
T02D1887:189b-35: rjod byed de de bzhin no //
T02D1887:189b-36: de ltar ni khyed 'dra ba la ni rnam par
T02D1887:189b-37: rig pa tsam gyi ngo bo de kho na go
T02D1887:189b-38: bar byed pa'am brdzun pa'i ngo bor snang ba tsam
T02D1887:189b-39: nyid kyi go bar byed pa dag gis gsang sngags
T02D1887:189b-40: kyi tshul la dbang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1887:189b-41: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi sems
T02D1887:189b-42: snang ba tsam du go ba la rang gi bud
T02D1887:189b-43: med du snang ba dang tha mi dad par 'jam
T02D1887:189b-44: pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa rang snang ba'i ngo
T02D1887:189b-45: bor yongs su gyur pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sgyu
T02D1887:189b-46: ma lta bu des rnam par sbyangs pa la dbang
T02D1887:189b-47: bskur pa kha na ma tho ba med ba thob
T02D1887:189b-48: pa la yang dge slong rnams kyi sdom ba zhig
T02D1887:189b-50: de dag ni bzhi pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02D1887:190a-0: dbang bskur mdo ra bsdus brjod pa las ni @190a * //
T02D1887:190a-2: dung zla kunda ku mu dang chu skyes 'od mtshungs pa'i //
T02D1887:190a-3: bsod nams gang yin mkha' dang mtshungs pa des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs //
T02D1887:190a-4: shes rab padma las byung rdo rje 'chang gi rang
T02D1887:190a-5: bzhin shog / gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1887:190a-6: cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02D1887:190a-8: // /'di ni pandi ta ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa /
T02D1887:190a-9: bal po'i pandi ta su ma ti k'i ti'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D1887:190a-10: bod kyi lo ts'a ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyi zhal snga nas dang /
